reviews.review: Do you like blundering your money to get skins worth absolutely nothing? Do you want to get stage 3 cancer? If so this is the best game there is to get a one way ticket to the hospital. I mean look at my hours, and I already have a brain tumor from this game.
nawet na tym prime niema takiej tragedii są cheaterzy ale nie aż tacy bobvious
